data.text: @GASenateGOP @apsupdate @BOEAPS lobbyists are using taxpayer funds to ask @GaHouseHub to move the @VoteClintDixon @GovKemp  SB514 sunset 2027 back to 2023. Tax dollars being used to force-mask our kids again? Muzzle the lobbyists, not our kids.

@GASenateGOP @Philip4Liberty & @VoterGa asking @GaRepublicans
to do what they said they were going to do: BAN the secret #QRcode from our paper ballots. #gapol #GeorgiaOnTheLine
#LeadRight #ElectionConfidenceTaskForce 
https://t.co/kADO4WxGNS

@GASenateGOP @GaRepublicans #ElectionConfidenceTaskForce called to remove secret #QRcodes from our paper ballots. No Ga voter can read or verify what's in the secret codes. And they're used to tabulate the hidden votes. Do your JOB. REMOVE the secret codes NOW. Ga voter are asking #gapol https://t.co/eMnopgLuYL
@GASenateGOP Georgia is a uni party of utter corruption folks! https://t.co/u6pE4qV51G

@GASenateGOP How about you guys convince @SpeakerRalston in the House to bring up HB-999 for a vote, too. Give parents a choice to mask their kids in school AND a choice about to which schools to send those kids.
@GASenateGOP When’s decertification of Georgia’s fraudulent elections
